description:
Miles was referred to us by one of our friends.
This young next door stud is truly one of a kind. We went out with him the night before the shoot, and it took all he had to stay away from the ladies, who were constantly checking him out. We're not surprised. This guy has it all... looks, body, and an incredible cock, which he tells us the girls love. He's currently in school, and he says it takes up almost all his time. But he's just about to finish, and when he does, the girls better watch out.
Watch Miles in the living room, the kitchen, and the bedroom as he takes care of himself.
Enjoy. We know you will.
title: Miles
